short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QRCodeString generates QR Code form a string

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QRCodeString generates qr code from a string.It  produces a random string of specified length and then encodes it into a qr code.The generated qr code image can be saved as a jpg file.
